document.full_text: russia's yandex is set to complete the biggest internet ipo since google, as investors wary of much-hyped social networks look instead for exposure to the fast-growing online advertising market.
document.title: online ad growth sparks rush for yandex ipo
lines_and_colors: russia's yandex is set to complete the biggest internet ipo since google, as investors wary of much-hyped social networks look instead for exposure to the fast-growing online advertising market.
